'''Tom''' is a friend of [[Danny]]'s. He appears in "[[The One Where Ross Moves In]]", portrayed by [[Doug Benson]].

Believing the two are a match, Danny invites Tom to his party, so he can introduce her to [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]].

Doug Benson was born in San Diego in 1962.  Among other things he has appeared on Comedy Central Presents and Best Week Ever.
